avalancheActivity.highlights: New snow has accumulated in rather light wind, decent accumulation can be in isolated areas. The snow cover can be unstable to begin with then settle and strengthen.

snowpackStructure.highlights: New snow has accumulated in rather light wind and then NW-wind, decent accumulation can be in isolated locations. Windslabs can form on top of loose snow. Older snow underwent a lasting thaw and rain period and is stable. Thinn slabs may have formed in gullies and lows in all aspects, but mainly in W-facing aspects.

travelAdvisory.comment: New snow expected over the weekend in light winds. Lot of new snow in some places.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New snow expected over the weekend in light winds. Lot of new snow in some places.

weatherForecast.highlights: Fremur hægur vindur og úrkomulítið næstu daga, bætir í úrkomu og austlæga átt á þriðjudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: New snow on top of wind slabs. No reports of recent avalanches. Older snow is uniform and stable after thaw followed by freezing.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Rather little snow and thin snowcover. Thin wind slabs expected in S-W facing aspects after NE wind and snow on last weekend. New snow in calm wind on Friday and W-wind today, Saturday. Older snow is uniform and stable after thaw followed by freezing.

travelAdvisory.comment: New snow expected over the weekend in light winds. Lot of new snow in some places.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New snow expected over the weekend in light winds. Lot of new snow in some places.

weatherForecast.highlights: Snjókoma í V- og SV-átt aðfaranótt sunnudags. Snýst í NA-átt um hádegi með áframhaldandi snjókomu. Úrkomulaust á mánudag og þriðjudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: One rather small avalanche fell in Siglufjarðarskarð by Siglufjörður on Monday 20.01. The avalanche did not reach the ski track.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Unstable windslabs, especially in westerly aspects. after NE and E snowstorm. The area has accumulated varying amounts of snow, only firn in some areas. Snowfall forecasted the next few days.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Unstable windslabs in gullies and new slabs likely in westerly facing aspects after NE and E snow storm last weekend and Monday. Snow cover is variable between places in the forecasting area with firn stickin gout in places. Snow pit from Siglufjörður 21.01. showed stiff wind slab ontop of older stiffer firn, CP fractured between layers with medium force at 38 cm depth. Faceting grains were found near bottom of pit between firn layers, like pit on 10.Jan. New snow forecasted in calm wind the next days.

travelAdvisory.comment: New snow expected over the weekend in light winds. Lot of new snow in some places.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New snow expected over the weekend in light winds. Lot of new snow in some places.

weatherForecast.highlights: Snjókoma í fremur hlægum vind næstu daga.

avalancheActivity.comment: Recent avalanche cycle during a E-NE snowstorm. Most reports near Neskaupstaður but some avalanches also in Seyðisfjörður, Mjóifjörðir and other places.
avalancheActivity.highlights: It has snowed considerably during E-winds. Many avalanches were reported in the beginning of the week.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It has snowed considerably in the Eastfjords, especially in the beginning of the week. New snow and thick wind slabs are present in the mountains, especially on S-W aspects and in gullies, which could be unstable.

travelAdvisory.comment: New snow expected over the weekend in light winds. Lot of new snow in some places.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New snow expected over the weekend in light winds. Lot of new snow in some places.

weatherForecast.highlights: Lítilsháttar snjókoma á sunnudag í hægum vindi. Úrkomulaust á mánudag og þriðjudag.
